// {{{ NX.Date.$xf

/**
 * @class NX.Date
 */

/**
 * @private
 */
module.exports = function(format) {

    var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 1);

    return format.replace(/\{(\d+)\}/g, function(m, i) {
        return args[i];
    });
};

// }}}

/*
 * Local variables:
 * tab-width: 4
 * c-basic-offset: 4
 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
 * End:
 */
